plot: Rick, fearful teen from South Bayou, inherits the family fortune. Later on, he begins receiving mysterious telephone calls that lead him to the brink of a nervous break down and to the realization disturbing truths.
title: The Telephone Calls
plot_es: Rick, fearful teen from South Bayou, inherits the family fortune. Later on, he begins receiving mysterious telephone calls that lead him to the brink of a nervous break down and to the realization disturbing truths.
plot_en: Rick, fearful teen from South Bayou, inherits the family fortune. Later on, he begins receiving mysterious telephone calls that lead him to the brink of a nervous break down and to the realization disturbing truths.
